Key Match Events: Alperen Şengün recorded 25 points, 18 rebounds, 5 assists, 4 steals, and 1 block over 34 minutes of play
LaMelo Ball led the Hornets with 34 points and 11 assists
Tre Mann added 24 points and 6 rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: Turkish star Alperen Şengün delivered an impressive performance despite the Rockets' narrow loss
Jalen Green and Fred VanVleet also had solid contributions
LaMelo Ball and Tre Mann powered the Hornets to victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adem Bona, a rising star from Türkiye and a recent draft pick, made his NBA debut for the 76ers
Adem Bona scored 2 points and grabbed 1 rebound in just 3 minutes of playing time
